projects.name: Hololens 2 - Research Project
projects.description: Research project currently in progress (until February 2024). The goal is to have an experience using Unity and Hololens 2. Project is done during semester abroad in Hakodate, Japan.

projects.name: C++ / OpenGL Paperplane Boids
projects.description: Boids simulation made in C++ and OpenGL. The goal was to learn how to use OpenGL and how to make a boids simulation. Also had fun using instancing and shaders.

projects.name: 3D Title Sequence
projects.description: Created the 3D title sequence of an invented movie using Blender and After Effects.

projects.name: Meshroom Geolocalisation
projects.description: Intensive 3 weeks team project in order to create a module for geolocalisation information in Meshroom software.

projects.name: Advent of Code 2022
projects.description: Everyday small challenges done in C++ and Python to learn about how to solve algorithm problems.

projects.name: MMI XP 2021
projects.description: Made in Three.js, I had the opportunity to work  on a virtual experience for a festival. Done in 2 months, I discovered Three.js and developped it.

projects.name: PokIMAC
projects.description: Pokemon-like game done in Semester 1 of IMAC school with Sarah N'Gotta

projects.name: Le QG
projects.description: Web project made in Semester 2 of IMAC school to teach us how to use PHP

projects.name: Les Cassoulettes Were Alone
projects.description: Small project with OpenGL made during Semester 2 of IMAC in 2022 with Sarah N'Gotta

projects.name: Walk Through Raster
projects.description: Interactive experience made in P5.js during Semester 2 of IMAC in 2022 with Sarah N'Gotta
